lines.text: Great integrated circuits! What's that thing? Look Tilly! A prehistoric cave robot!
I've never seen anything so ugly.
They say creatures like this shouldn't be allowed to run around loose. They ought to be kept in zoos.
Now Tilk, that's just prejudice. He has as much right to activate as we have, even if his tin is a different color.
Listen Tilly, I've written a poem for you. Wanna hear it? It's called Passion in a Printed Circuit.
